content: transform your home decor with this stylish modern boho crochet pillowcase that s removable and a perfect accent pillow for any room in your home about the pattern - this bohemian crochet pillow pattern creates a modern stylish removable pillowcase - you can use any color of any size 4 medium yarn to match your home decor - the pattern includes step by step instructions on how to make this pillow with a chart
